org.j2free.config
Class ConfigurationListener

java.lang.Object
  org.j2free.config.ConfigurationListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
public class ConfigurationListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

If a Configuration is found and successfully loaded, then the following items will be configured accordingly: - RunMode - InvokerFilter - StaticJspServlet - LogoutServlet - ProxyServlet - EntityAdminServlet - Fragment Caching - Task ScheduledExecutorService - SimpleEmailService - SimpleHttpService - EmailErrorReporter - Spymemcached - Dynamic Reconfiguration Lacking a Configuration default values will be used, and the above items will not be initialized. Finally, this method of configuration can be ignore entirely by removing the servlet-mapping. The ServletContextListener contextInitialized methods are called before any filters or servlets are instantiated.

See Also:
org.j2free.util.Constants for a list of configurable properties.
